text: 11.17 Jer 11.16, Apo 2.39, Epe 2.11-19 Yislel binɨb kɨli mab olip teplep ñɨn kɨd ogɨnap tek mɨdebal. Ñɨn kɨd anɨb okok, God kɨlop ogɨnap tɨpag lɨl dɨyokup. Pen nɨbi binɨb Juda mel okok, mab olip be okok ñɨn kɨd ogɨnap tek mɨdebɨm. God nɨbop tɨpag lɨl dad amɨl, mab olip teplep day ak bɨnɨg ñɨl, nag lɨl tɨbɨkup. Anɨgek, nɨbi mab anɨb ak ñɨn kɨd tep dɨyokup okok, tep kɨli ak dɨpɨm. Dɨl, mɨñɨl mab olip teplep mok ne teplep ak, mab ñɨn kɨd ogɨnap dup tek nɨbi abe dɨl, anɨgɨl mɨdtep gɨpɨm.
